author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: I remember back in 2002 when they were removing the tricolor in the Netherland approaches, we sailed past about five miles south of the salvage operation, they were ‘hull down’ but the cranes were huge.

author: Rick Spilman
content: The ship’s fuel has been removed. There is never much gasoline in the car’s fuel tanks.

author: Phil
content:
They will be cutting into auto gas tanks, oil pans, ship fule, etc.
Hopefully they deal with leaks from those?
